title: Gold 2 ADC LF any other lane duo :)
body: yo! adc looking for someone who isnt  too serious, understands everyone has bad games and just wants to re que wether or not we get smashed.

replies.body: I'll add you after a game, silver 3 - 75 LP - http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=lexythedeer I one trick thresh.  I also use discord, play very aggressive and lane dominate in solo queue.

Hey,
I’m a support main, I’ve just started playing ranked and with a good ADC I generally have a pretty promising game.

I usually play Lux (m7) and Nami (m6), however I have been also testing out Sona as well as Ahri support and Nidalee support.

Hmu on discord if you are interested :3 Lush#5162
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
